title: cmd/5g: missing MRC instruction causes linux/arm GOARM=5 build to fail
body:
by **rounin.urashima**: 
What steps will reproduce the problem?

1. hg clone -u release https://code.google.com/p/go
2. cd go/src
3. hg pull
4. hg update
5. hg update tip
6. ./all.bash


What is the expected output?

ALL TESTS PASSED

---

What do you see instead?

rounin@LKG:~/go/src$ hg identify
96b485225cef tip

cat -n ~/golang_install_Thu30Jan2014_0055.txt

Which operating system are you using?

Debian

Which version are you using?  (run 'go version')
go not built on system

hg identify
96b485225cef tip

Please provide any additional information below.

This is a Debian Linux system running on an LINKSYS NSLU2 ARM device

Linux LKG 3.2.0-4-ixp4xx #1 Debian 3.2.41-2 armv5tel GNU/Linux

more /etc/issue
Debian GNU/Linux 7.0 \n \l
